all_in_one: All-in-one platform helping businesses in Africa to sell online worldwide for the very first time
buy_world_wide_customers: Helping customers around the world to buy dynamic products and services from Cameroon.
we_support_businese_throughout: We support businesses throughout the selling process and ensure customers receive good value for their money .
from_ourMarket_place: from our Marketplace in Cameroon and around the world
with_over_100_categories: With over 100 categories of products, easily shop from businesses in Cameroon anytime,anywhere.
sell_online_in_person: With Bridge, selling online has never been so simple.
setup_an_ecommerce: Set up an ecommerce shop and sell
to_millions: to millions around you and the world
find_product_and_services: Find and buy products and services

easily_manage_your_business: Get your gains by mobile payment or bank transfer.
large_marketplace_and_digital: Large marketplace and digital payment solution.
we_help_customers_online_to: We help customers worldwide to buy products and services from Cameroon, and seamlessly pay using local and international payment solutions.
we_help_you_easily_find: We help you easily find businesses with affordable prices, giving you the ability to compare businesses with the best pricing around you.
find_products_and_services: find products and service from Cameroon
hire_a_professional_tailor: Hire a professional tailor today to enjoy personalised, high quality, Made to Measure tailoring service that represents outstanding value for money
to_help_you_make_more_money: to help you make more money online
use_our_special_design_training: Use our specially designed training curriculum to help enhance your entrepreneurial and digital skills, learn how to properly use your bridgeafrica.com online shop, and comfortably engage in global e-commerce
bizconnect_show_is_a15_min: Biz Konnect is a 15-minute TV program that highlights the integration of businesses into the world of e-commerce through the bridgeafrica.com platform. Each episode highlights the online shop of the business and its products, prompting viewers to buy from the business.
the_show_is_aired: The show is aired every Wednesday on Cameroon’s national public broadcaster, CRTV, and has been running for over 2 years.
reach_a_wider_community: Reach a wider community with our group messaging functionality
while_you_can_use: While you can use Bridge Africa for free through a basic account, upgrading to an advanced account will enable you to do the full e-commerce transaction cycle.
unlimited_market_place_to_sell: Unlimited marketplace to sell to millions around you and the world
help_small_and_medium_size: 98% of businesses in Cameroon have never done business online, lacking digital tools and skills. Our platform helps overcome those barriers so they can do business locally and internationally. Currently based in Cameroon, we plan to expand to the rest of Africa in the next few years.
all_in_1_platform: All-In-One platform helping businesses to easily create a digital presence to sell online.
support_real_time: Supporting real time financial transactions and shipping logistics.
connecting_local_demand: Connecting local businesses to local and global supply.
lets_help_you_find_products_and_service: Let’s help you find products and service from Cameroon
find_everything_you_need: Find everything you need, anytime, anywhere, all in one place.Find quality ready-to-ship products, or personalised customisations and enjoy rapid deliveries.
step1_identify_the_state: Identify and state the products and services you need
step2_contact_bridgeafrica: Contact Bridge Africa and receive multiple quotations
step3_place_your_order: Place your order and pay in all security
ever_since_i_started_using_ba: Ever since I started using Bridge Africa, my payments have been regular. I receive my money immediately my clients receive their products…and what's more? I can get paid via mobile money.
i_have_double_my_chiken_production: I have doubled my production since I started selling on bridgeafrica.com
i_will_always_recommend_ba: I will always recommend Bridge Africa because it is a major platform where young entrepreneurs like myself can get exposure and connect with more customers worldwide.
as_a_busy_mother: As a busy mother in Cameroon I can compare prices and buy from the comfort of home
with_ba_i_was_able_sew: With bridge Africa I was able to sew my wedding gown at affordable price and in record time
i_am_a_restaurant_owner: I am restaurant owner and I can tell you, with Bridge Africa I am able to find food supplies like vegetables, chickens, oil and more at great prices
days_after_suppier_receives: days after supplier receives the initial payment
homepage_landing: An e-commerce platform empowering businesses to partner and sell with customers locally and globally
get_in_touch_with: Looking for cocoa, poultry, or pig farmers among others? Contact our PEA-Jeunes network of agricultural entrepreneurs to get what you need
explore_tailors12: Looking for a tailor to sew your dress, an embroiderer, a weaver or dyer?. contact us so we can help you  find what you need
our_network_accounts: Our network accounts can help you work with key sectors of Cameroon's business spectrum
rank_top_on_search: Ranked top on our search result
business_on_advance: Businesses on advanced accounts are ranked first (top) on our search results
while_you_can: While you can use Bridge Africa for free through a basic account, upgrading to an advanced account will give you abilities to do the full e-commerce transaction cycle.
